'''Melilot Brandybuck''' (born {{SR|1385}}) was a distant cousin of both [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Frodo Baggins]].

==History==
Melilot was the daughter of [[Marmadas Brandybuck]].<ref>{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref> She was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Bilbo's Birthday Party]] in {{SR|1401}}, when she was just sixteen years old. The only part she played in the great events of that time was to dance the [[springle-ring]] at the party with [[Everard Took]].<ref>{{FR|Party}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''[[wikipedia:melilot|Melilot]]'', or Sweet Clover, is a grassland plant. The name derives from Greek ''μελίλωτος'' "honey lotus".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"; see also {{LB|3}}, p. 159</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
In an early version of the [[legendarium]], ''Melilot'' was a tentative name for the character later known as [[Lúthien|Lúthien Tinúviel]].<ref>{{LB|3}}, p. 159</ref>
